price: 121. Markaasay (Aadam iyo Xawwaa) wax ka cuneen (geedkii), saa waxaa u muuqday cawradoodii, waxayna billaabeen inay ku dhejiyaan (asturaan) korkooda caleemihii Jannada. Wuxuuna Aadam ku caasiyey Rabbigi oo wuu habaabay24.
arabic: فَأَكَلَا مِنۡهَا فَبَدَتۡ لَهُمَا سَوۡءَٰتُهُمَا وَطَفِقَا يَخۡصِفَانِ عَلَيۡهِمَا مِن وَرَقِ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۚ وَعَصَىٰٓ ءَادَمُ رَبَّهُۥ فَغَوَىٰ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-akalā min'hā fabadat lahumā sawātuhumā waṭafiqā yakhṣifāni ʿalayhimā min waraqi al-janati waʿaṣā ādamu rabbahu faghawā
